project_description: This project is an implementation that integrates <1>OpenAI</1> and an exchange rate service, using modern technologies like <3>NestJS</3> for the backend and <5>React</5> for the frontend, all built in <7>TypeScript</7>. The interface is styled with <9>Tailwind CSS</9>.
project_advanced: It uses the capabilities of <1>OpenAI Chat Completion</1> along with Function Calling to interpret and execute user instructions dynamically and accurately.
chat_memory_warning: This chat does not have memory â€” previous messages won't be remembered.
